page.title: 10The Abbey National
page.content:
A building society helps people to buy their own house. It lends money that others have invested with the society. Building societies have been running for 200 years but the Abbey National started in 1944 when they were 2 groups;one was called the Abbey Road and the other was called The National. They have one main computer but 3000 computers spread throughout their branches. It is thought that in the future building societies will act like estate agents as well.
By Holy Trinity School
